summary: Tested Credits page design improvements and Profile page Credits & Boosts section. All features working correctly after expo restart.
critical_code_review_comments: Credits page calculateSavings function correctly compares packages to base (smallest) package
SAVE X% badges appear on Popular Pack (17%) and Pro Pack (29%)
Price per credit displayed: Starter $0.100, Popular $0.083, Pro $0.071
Package selection triggers animation and changes button to 'Purchase Now'
Selected package shows checkmark icon and blue border styling
Desktop Profile page has Credits & Boosts section between Activity and Trust & Identity
Buy Credits button navigates to /credits correctly
Boost Listings button navigates to /profile/my-listings correctly
Desktop layout uses max-width 1280px with centered content

Profile Credits & Boosts section only visible for authenticated users on desktop view (>768px width). Initially had to restart expo to pick up latest code changes.

credits_package_animation.details: Clicking package triggers Animated.spring scale animation and updates selectedPackage state
